verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*; let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*: he \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*; let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be \w moved|strong="H5120"\w*.\f + \fr 99.1 \ft be moved: Heb. stagger\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; and he \add is\add* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* above all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
Let them \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; \add for\add* it \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

The \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* also \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; thou dost \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* \w equity|strong="H4339"\w*, thou \w executest|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* in \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w Exalt|strong="H7311"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* at his \w footstool|strong="H7272"\w*; \add for\add* he \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.\f + \fr 99.5 \ft he is…: or, it is holy\f*

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* among his \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* among them that \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them.

He \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them in the \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*: they \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* his \w testimonies|strong="H5713"\w*, and the \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w* \add that\add* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them.

Thou \w answeredst|strong="H6030"\w* them, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thou wast a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w forgavest|strong="H5375"\w* them, though thou tookest \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* of their \w inventions|strong="H5949"\w*.

\w Exalt|strong="H7311"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* at his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.
